sentences: Witold Sobociński (Polish pronunciation: [ˈvitɔlt sɔbɔˈt͡ɕiɲskʲi]; 15 October 1929 – 19 November 2018) was a Polish cinematographer, academic teacher as well as former jazz musician.
In 1967 he debuted as a cinematographer.
He was a lecturer at the film school in Łódź from 1980 until his death in 2018.
Just over a week before his death, he was awarded the Lifetime Achievement Award at the prestigious Camerimage film festival.
His son Piotr Sobociński (1958 – 2001) was also a cinematographer.
